name: Eric Green - John L. Scott Real Estate

yelp_reviews.author: Dylan L.
yelp_reviews.review: 5/5! Being paired up with the right realtor is key in a market like this. Eric is experienced and privy to all things Whatcom County real estate - and personable to an extent where you feel like you've been friends for years. Highly recommend chatting with Eric about any of your buyer/seller needs!

yelp_reviews.author: Haylee H.
yelp_reviews.review: Between October to December of 2018, I had the absolute pleasure of working on finding my first home with Eric Green. He is extremely patient, knowledgeable and efficient. I never felt pressured to "settle" and knew that Eric was always acting with my best interests in mind. I would highly recommend Eric to anyone in need of a real estate agent and know that whenever I decide to buy another home or sell this one, I'll work with Eric.
